mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_notify( ID, otype, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, FILES, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, effective_date, end_date, send_type, s_id, source, views ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{otype}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{files}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{effectiveDate}, #{endDate}, #{sendType}, #{sId}, #{source}, #{views} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_notify SET otype = #{otype}, TYPE = #{type}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, FILES = #{files}, STATUS = #{status}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy.id}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}, REMARKS = #{remarks}, effective_date = #{effectiveDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, send_type = #{sendType}, s_id = #{sId}, source=#{source}, views=#{views} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.TITLE AS "title", a.CONTENT AS "content", a.DEL_FLAG AS "delFlag", a.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", a.send_type AS "sendType" FROM oa_notify a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' and a.send_type='1' and a.status='1' and a.type='3' ORDER BY a.update_date DESC limit #{number}

SELECT count(distinct a.id) FROM oa_notify a LEFT JOIN oa_notify_record r ON r.oa_notify_id = a.id AND ((r.user_id = #{id} AND a.otype = '0') OR (r.office_id = #{professional} AND a.otype = '1')) LEFT JOIN oa_notify_reoffilter rf ON rf.oa_notify_id = a.id AND rf.user_id = #{id} WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.read_flag = 0 AND a.type not IN (3,4,8,9) AND rf.id IS NULL

( SELECT a.ID AS "id", a.otype AS "otype", a.TYPE AS "type", a.TITLE AS "title", a.CONTENT AS "content", a.FILES AS "files", a.STATUS AS "status", a.CREATE_BY AS "CREATE_BY", a.CREATE_DATE AS "CREATE_DATE", a.UPDATE_BY AS "UPDATE_BY", a.UPDATE_DATE AS "UPDATE_DATE", a.REMARKS AS "remarks", a.DEL_FLAG AS "DEL_FLAG", a.effective_date AS "effective_date", a.end_date AS "end_date", a.send_type AS "send_type", a.s_id AS "s_id", a.source AS "source", a.views AS "views", r.ID AS "RId", r.USER_ID AS "RUSER_ID", r.READ_FLAG AS "RREAD_FLAG", r.READ_DATE AS "RREAD_DATE", r.operate_flag AS "Roperate_flag", r.out_team AS "Rout_team" FROM oa_notify a LEFT JOIN oa_notify_record r ON r.oa_notify_id = a.id AND r.user_id = #{currentUser.id} AND a.otype = '0' WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.read_flag = 0 AND a.type not IN (3,4,8,9) )

) a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.rread_flag = 0 AND a.type not IN (3,4,8,9) order by a.effective_date desc
